postings.body:
For photos, questions, and more please visit our website:
http://luckybendlookout.com/#/tab/photos
Location: Guerneville, CA.
Vacation Rental Details:
Bedrooms: 3
Bathrooms: 1.0
Sleeps: 8
Sq Ft: 940
Amenities Include:
Dock and Kayaks (mid June through late September)
Cozy Radiant Floor Heating
Baby Equipment
Kid Toys and Swings
Garage
Washer & Dryer
Fully Stocked Kitchen
See more on our website: http://luckybendlookout.com
Rate: from $210 per night
Description:
Think traveling with kids means sacrificing gorgeous, architecturally inspiring accommodations?
Think again. Your kids will feel like woodland creaturesand youll feel like a travel-planning wizardwhen your family settles into our mid-century modern cabin, tucked into a dense stand of redwoods beside the Russian River in Guerneville. (One ancient redwood has been presiding over our part of the forest for over a thousand years!)
A true mid-century modern gem, Lucky Bend Lookout was architect-designed and constructed in 1966, and is kid-friendly down to the childproofed details. Its environmentally friendly, too. During a recent remodel, we took care to increase thermal performance by 400 percent (that includes heated floors!) and used only sustainable building materials and native plants. Protecting nature which is so gorgeously on display here is a priority for us.
In true mid-century modern tradition, the Lucky Bend Lookouts open floor plan, elevated treehouse-style deck, enormous windows, and warm redwood walls and ceilings merge indoor and outdoor spaces.
Have you ever vacationed somewhere thats brimming with natural beauty and felt guilty for just wanting to relax inside with a good book? Here, thats no dilemma.
Watch ospreys soar among the redwoods from the couch in the living area, decorated with clean lines and whimsical fabrics. Or saute fresh vegetables from the Guerneville Farmers Market in our fully stocked kitchen as you watch your kids play outside on the deck.
Then, present your handiwork to your hungry family at the sleek dining table which has room for 10 and watch the Russian River drifting by in the fading light of evening while the adults sip our regions famous wines. Or you can get even closer to nature and feast at the eight-person outdoor dining table on the spacious deck among the trees.
After dinner, get cozy in the living room and watch the stars reflect their sparkle on the river as you browse Netflix, HuluPlus, or Pandora Radio on our 47-inch flat screen TV. The couch doubles as a pull-out bed.
For the kids, we keep our cabin clear of breakable knickknacks and stocked with all the gear you need. A Pack n Play, high chair, step stool, potty-chair, toddler bed rail, baby swing, and stroller keep the little ones safe. Plus, we supply a few extra goodies to keep them happy, like a water table, a swing set under the deck, and some inside toys.
One bedroom features a reading nook and a sturdy set of bunk beds for a fun, summer-camp setup, except much comfier--we use memory foam mattresses on all of our beds. And your kids imaginations will run wild with the magical redwood grove in view just outside their window.
Two adult bedrooms, with queen-sized beds and mid-century modern details like shag carpeting and low-profile beds, invite you to sink in for the night. A view of the redwoods will greet you in the morning.
Downtown Guerneville is only a mile from the Lucky Bend Lookout. We are located 10 minutes by car from the nearest winery and 15 to 20 minutes from dozens more. Theres even a kid-friendly wineries in the area! A sandy beach along the Russian River is a 10-minute walk from the property, or hop in the car and head 20 minutes to the Sonoma Coast to surf, explore tide pools, and spot harbor seals sunning themselves. Lucky Bend Lookout comes with beach chairs, an umbrella, beach toys, a cooler, a picnic basket, and a cruiser bike.
Our calendar fills fast. The time to book your mid-century modern oasis is today!
Check our web site for availability:
http://luckybendlookout.com/#/tab/inquire/
You can also see us (and lots if positive reviews) at VRBO.com/465158

postings.body:
This spacious duplex is PET FREE, allergy free, low drama, & fantastically located, I just need 2 other kick ass people to share it with. We would be on the top floor of a homey duplex over our very accessible, responsive and KOOKY landlord, his wife and their child. If you like the idea of participating in a community living arrangement, more details are below.
The Space:
The space is large. It`s got 3 bedrooms and 1 bathrooms with hardwood floors throughout. There are high ceilings, lots of windows & natural light, and authentic 1930`s architecture.. There`s also central air & heating, and out back, there is a utility room with washer and dryer. This gorgeous unit is within walking distance of the Houston Museum of Natural Science, The Med Center, and the Houston Zoo. We are right next to the bike path along N MacGregor Way, and a 15- 20 minute bike ride to U of H. It take about 8 minutes to drive to U of H and we`re next to the #11 bus stop.
The Rooms: $500 a piece. There are 3 bedrooms, each very roomy. Here is where the kookiness of the landlord comes in. He is a very private person, and wouldn`t let me take pictures of the place or get measurements. I would estimate that they were about 12` by 12`, but I can`t guarantee it. The master bedroom is a bit larger than the others, but I totally call dibs on it because I got here first, but it evens out because it`s the only one that doesn`t have a closet.
The People:
My name is Nakia and I love meeting new people! When I have spare time, I like to cook, play board games, read, volunteer, and generally hang out with people and learn new things. However, I`ll be attending grad school this fall, and don`t anticipate having free time to speak of. My betrothed lives in Austin, and will be coming up occasionally to visit me. He`s sweet and way more low key than I am.
I hope to make a home with my housemates instead of just having a space where were all live. It`s very important to me that we all get along and have fun together as much as possible as 3 people with busy lives can manage. I love having house dinners and wine and fantastic conversations. I really do want to hear about your day and lives.
You would need to have the following attributes:
Openmindedness - Gay, straight, bi, black, white, brown, trans, tall, short, fat, medium, I don`t discriminate and neither do you.
Mutual Respect - Respect for others and their boundaries is the *minimum*
Cleanliness - Your room can be a mess, but please keep the common areas clean
Responsibility - You need to be aware that your actions or inaction effects the people around you and be responsible for what you do or don`t do
Desire to make positive contributions to a harmonious household -I could live with someone who just pays rent & is never home but I want someone who shares the awesome
Body positive- The space will be clothing optional, I might hang out in a room in my underwear, housemates can walk around with less than towels on. If you tend more towards the prudish, this is not the house for you.
Friendliness (environmentally or 420 and otherwise) - I want to have positive interactions with you & want you to have them with us!
Someone who pays bills on time - This really goes under responsibility, but it`s important enough to list twice
Pet free - I am allergic to any animals with fur or feathers.
Someone who has a life - if you aren`t in some way interesting or engaging, then we are probably not compatible.
Conservative with the A/C - I usually have the heat set to come on at 69, and the A/C at 79. This is negotiable, but its part of being environmentally friendly & keeping the bills down.
Doesn`t watch a lot of television - Although, there is a charge for it, I prefer not to have a television in the house at all. The last 2 houses that I lived in haven`t had TVs in them and we talked to each other instead or read a book. It was great.
Does not smoke cigarettes- I allergic & it just smells bad.
Able to pay your part of the deposit - Which is the cost of the room.
An adult, emotionally and biologically. 25+ because, damned kids, get off my lawn! :)
Rent is due monthly of and we will split utilities and wireless internet- the water is shared with the landlord and his family. I haven`t lived there so I don`t know what to expect for utilities yet. The landlord gave me some numbers, that sounded reasonable, but I don`t remember the specifics. Deposit is $670. The room is available on August 8. I would love to meet you! Please send me an email letting me know about you & how awesome you are! I will need to meet with you in person. It`s really important that we do, because it`s hard to get a feel for people over a medium- including skype. I will be in Austin for the next couple of weeks, so if you are too, meeting here is great. If you are only available to meet in Houston, I can arrange to meet many people on one day.
Thank you for reading this far and I hope to hear from you soon!
IF THE AD IS STILL POSTED, I AM STILL LOOKING FOR A HOUSE MATE.

postings.body:
$135 / 1br - 600ft² - One bedroom Oceanfron Vacation Rental Condo - see Turtles (Lahaina-Kahana).
Aloha and welcome to our comfortable tropical condo, Mahina Surf #113. If you`re looking for a comfortable condo on the West coast of Maui. . . Look no further! The Mahina Surf is located on the West Shore of Maui, between Lahaina and Kapalua, hidden in a small-secluded cluster of private condos, with views of Lanai and Molokai. Just a few minutes ride to the north or south, the resort areas of Kapalua and Kaanapali offer world class golf, tennis, dining, shopping, and a host of beach activities. In the winter months the waters off West Maui play host to migrating humpback whales, putting on spectacular displays - many of which can be seen from our lanai. The property is a low rise complex (56 units) with over two acres of un-crowded space. Throughout the property you`ll find many tropical gardens consisting of pacific rim and native Hawaiian plants. Other property amenities include our ocean side solar heated pool with views of the islands of Lanai and Molokai, pool side tables and chairs for sunbathing or pupu`s, coin operated laundry, free parking and three ocean side complimentary Weber gas barbeque grills. All owners are involved in the care and maintenance of our property and buildings, making Mahina Surf one of the most beautiful properties on the west side. Our condo is on the first floor with amazing unobstructed ocean views from the lanai, living and dining room. Our unit provides easy access to the pool, grounds and parking lot without stairs. From the lanai you`ll find four chairs and a large patio table where we enjoy most of our meals outdoors from our private lanai. Our condo is a one bedroom unit furnished with a Queen size bed, chest of drawers, night stands, closet (with programmable safe), cordless phone, digital clock radio and flat screen TV. Just down the hall is an updated bathroom with a full walk in shower enclosure, sink and mirror vanity and medicine cabinet. We have a fully equipped kitchen recently updated with granite countertops. In the kitchen you`ll find a fill-sized refrigerator, oven, glass cooktop stove, dishwasher and microwave. An ample amount of cookware, utensils and appliances (blender, coffee maker, etc.) are available for preparation of your own meal. Our unit has bamboo wood flooring throughout. The kitchen and dining area lead to a spacious living area with a queen sized sofa sleeper, recliner and chairs. There are several entertainment options available including a flat screen LCD TV, Blu Ray/DVD player, Free WiFi and wired internet and iPod stereo docking station. You`ll love the view from this condo as you sit on the private lanai and watch sunsets, turtles, whales during the winter months, sailboats, surfers, paddle boarders and so much more.
We know you`ll enjoy your stay at Mahina Surf 113!
please visit our website at www.rodzmauicondo.com.
Available Aug. 6 - Sept. 5, Oct. 14 - Nov. 15th.

postings.heading: Own room for $600 close to CSULB

postings.body:
5 Master suites plus den, 5 full/3 half bath, sleeps 10 to 14.
Sunnybank is an Oceanfront Majestic Compound on 3 Elevated Acres located only 2 miles into the 4-wheel drive section of the OBX in the Corolla/Carova area. All 3 buildings come with the rental. Sunnybank is on a 23 foot elevation overlooking the majestic Atlantic Ocean, Currituck Sound, Corolla Lighthouse & the famous Monkey Island and boasts of the best views for 100 miles.
We book fast and are accepting reservations for 2015.
Our new Victorian Estate in the heart of Duck Village is very similar to Sunnybank and has 6 large master bedrooms that sleep 18 people. We have July 18 & August 15th weeks still available if you are looking for prime weeks this season. Website: http://thesaltaire.com
If you need more bedrooms or don`t have a 4 wheel drive SUV The Saltaire Mansion is the home for you! Our street has its own private beach access. If you like being within strolling distance of all the best restaurants, shops and sound front boardwalk Saltaire is centered in the heart of the Famous Duck Village .
Both our homes have a Friday to Friday rental weeks in order to save you wasted hours in the weekend traffic. The entire island (400,000+) turns over on Sat & Sun and is funneled into 2 roads. You`ll coast in on Friday, do your shopping and be hanging around the pool while the other 400,000 are stuck in traffic.
The rate you see is the full total that you pay. We do not add on another 20 % of taxes and service fees like other companies, we have already built that into our pricing so that what you see is what you pay.
Sunnybank is 10 minutes from the Food Lion shopping complex offering unlimited shopping, restaurants, bars, golf, etc. The local gas station/store can be accessed in less than 5 minutes.
Rated best undiscovered beach.: Amenities include elevator, Large salt-water pool, Kiddie pool, 2 hot tubs, gourmet kitchen and so much more. Seclusion with easy accessibility is the main ingredients for this fabulous mansion. But most of all you stay with us will help you forget how to work and remember how to play and have fun again.
If you`re in the mood for a beach drive, the Virginia border is a 14-mile jaunt North. Drive carefully; the beach is visited by sea turtles, seals resting on their migration, etc. Dolphin sightings are common; whale sightings are much less common.
The remarkable area surrounding Sunnybank.: The area boasts a beautiful shoreline, two of the East Coast`s largest sand dunes, 4 famous lighthouses, museums, water sports, great shopping and a plethora of restaurants, not to mention great fishing & wildlife. True oceanfront living tempts you to enjoy wild mustangs grazing in your own yard, star lit walks along the beaches, waking up to the surf and exploration of the Sound in a relaxing environment.
Things to do: Locally, you may want to visit the Whalehead Club at the lighthouse, a turn of the Century hunting `camp.` It`s a restored mansion from the glory days of the great hunt camps of the gilded age. Tours are given daily. Right next door, the Currituck Beach Lighthouse is also open for tours. There`s a lighthouse, keeper`s cottage and a bit of the old Corolla village. The wildlife preserve offers great free activities along with a interesting video and museum.
2nd Largest Dune on the Eastern Seaboard.: Penny`s Hill Dune, (the Outer Banks second largest natural dune, second only to Jockey`s Ridge) is located almost in your backyard. Savor the water views from every room of this unique coastal destination. Let unsurpassed ocean sunrises and sound sunsets mesmerize you. The local gas station/convenience store can be accessed in less than 5 minutes. It is like having your own private driveway; one side is bounded by the Atlantic Ocean, guarded by an army of Sandpipers, marching in unison along the water edge. On the other side exists an estuarine nature sanctuary, on the beautiful Currituck Outer Banks in a last truly pristine area, with high sand dunes, beautiful trees and thousands of acres of Island Sanctuary.

Charming Tahoe-style decorations abound in the two-story open floor plan with exposed beams. Enjoy a crackling wood fire in our stone fireplace in the comfortable living area. Grill on the gas BBQ and take in views of beautiful pine trees from the wood deck. There are 2 bedrooms with 2 full baths. Quality linens are provided for the comfort of up to six guests.

The renowned Flume Trail, the Tahoe Rim Trail, and a myriad of hiking and biking trails are in close proximity. Top-notch golf can be found at two Incline Village courses, the Championship and Mountain Courses.Our loft-style condo is in central Incline Village, an easy walk to Raley`s, Starbucks, the beautiful new library, and a host of family-style and gourmet restaurants. I`m 21 so I`m looking for someone around my age that doesn`t mind a party here and there also, 420 friendly! As long as you have your med card! First and last months rent is due either at move-in date or you can pay for the first months rent before moving in and the other $600 right before you move in. No kids, or pets. Also, must not be afraid of large dogs. Any further questions, please don`t hesitate to email me.
I`m located in the Cabrini Villas.
"Cabrini Villas Community is a family oriented community surrounded by natural areas, a park, playground areas, 6 lighted tennis courts (with a tennis pro), saunas for both men and women, a basketball court, a volleyball court, 7 pools and 4 jacuzzis.
It has a beautiful clubhouse that is accessible to the homeowners and is also available for rental for special meetings, private parties, weddings and other community group gatherings.
In addition to all of the beautiful local landscaping, there is a community park located at the top of the hill. Deer roam freely throughout Cabrini Villas. Please observe speed limits and deer crossing signs". http://www.cabrinivillashoa.com/about-cabrini/cabrini-villas-community

postings.body:
High-end, well-maintained town home`s basement with private bedroom, private bath, your own kitchenette and semi-private living area.
This is ideal for someone who wants their own space, but occasional contact with a housemate.
A 10 minute walk to Wegman`s, Panera bread, and other great shopping and dining.
A 10 minute walk to Montgomery College too, and the new Holy Cross Hospital next door to it.
Reserved parking space in front of the house.
The 70 Bethesda express Ride-on picks you up from the front of the house and drops you off at NIH, Medical Center and Bethesda Metro stations every 15 minutes. If you work at NIH or nearby, you can get to work with a monthly Ride-On pass without even using the metro.
The bathroom and bedroom are private. The living area is your own, but semi-private, as the home staircase is an open staircase. The laundry, located in the basement, is shared, and occasionally I will need to use the back door to get to the backyard. This is a great arrangement for having your own space, but without being completely alone.
The basement is a walk-out basement, but you can use the front door as it is easier to access.
Female applicants are preferred, I am female, but everyone will be considered.
The basement has brand new paint and carpet. It looks and feels like a new house.
Pictured are the living room with marble floors, the bedroom, bathroom and kitchenette.
The white bookcase pictured will stay in the living area but I will not be accessing it much if any.
The kitchenette includes a microwave, refrigerator, electric stove for light cooking, sink and cabinets as pictured.
Ready to see now, move-in after credit & background check approval.
If you are interested, please send your name, a brief description about yourself, when you are looking to move, and a phone number or email address to get back to you. I will not reply to short messages if you do not introduce yourself and provide contact info. This is to sort out spam from real people.
Look forward to hearing from you!

Cabin is in North Georgia mountains.
Rates are $135 (NOV-FEB) to $175 (MARCH-OCT) per night ...weekly discounted rates...See special at website!
DESCRIPTION
---------------------------------------------------------------
Lots of choices for your mountain getaway, but few have the river views of PARADISE RIVER RETREAT just 30 feet from the fabulous Toccoa River. Drive 1.8 miles through the National Forest to arrive at Paradise!
The pristine Toccoa is a premier trout fishing river and is regularly stocked by the fish hatchery just a few miles away.
Soak in the fabulous Hot Springs hot tub
 Cabin has great river views and has a cascading stream on one side. Access to the river is just a few steps from the cabin and is NOT steep.
Enjoy fishing, kayaking and hiking from this rustic cabin whimsically decorated as a fishing cabin, but offering all the conveniences of home. AC, fully equipped kitchen, gas grill, satellite tv , DSL, Fireplace! SLEEPS 9
